tool_description: Identifies missing skills and qualifications by comparing applicant's current skillset against job requirements.

current_skills.description: List of applicant's current skills and competencies

required_skills.description: Skills explicitly required by the job posting

preferred_skills.description: Skills listed as preferred or nice-to-have

experience_level.description: Current experience level (entry, mid, senior, executive)

error_messages: Empty skills arrays: Both current_skills and required_skills must contain at least one item.
Invalid experience level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive].
Duplicate skills entries: Remove duplicate items from skills arrays.
usage: Compare your current skills against job requirements to identify gaps and receive recommendations for addressing missing qualifications.

skills_match_percentage.description: Percentage of required skills the applicant possesses

missing_critical_skills.description: Required skills that are completely absent from applicant's skillset

transferable_skills.description: Applicant skills that relate to job requirements but may need reframing

skill_development_priority.description: Skills to prioritize for learning or highlighting, ranked by importance

compensation_strategies.description: Ways to address skill gaps through existing experience or alternative qualifications
